#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
using namespace std;
#define inf 100000
#define SZ 55
#define LL long long
priority_queue<int>pq;
int main()
{
    int t,n,m,k,i,j,res,c,tm;
    char ar;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf(" %d %d %d",&n,&m,&k);
        getchar();
        for(i=0; i<n; i++)
        {
            c=0;
            for(j=0; j<m; j++)
            {
                scanf("%c",&ar);
                if(ar=='*') c++;
            }
            pq.push(m-c);
            getchar();
        }
        for(i=0;i<k;i++)
        {
            tm=m-pq.top();
            pq.pop();
            pq.push(tm);
        }
        res=0;
        while(!pq.empty())
        {
           res+=m-pq.top();
           pq.pop();
        }
        printf("%d\n",res);
    }
    return 0;
}
/*
2
2 2 1
..
**
2 2 2
..
**
*/
